A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed it very much. As a long time fan of the series\, it may not have hit all the notes I may have Wanted or Expected\, but as a movie telling the story it was\, it was a great time. And for all the complaints I may have\, there are a equal and greater number of compliments.\nYes it drags\, and yes it's weird (even for Star Wars). But it's clever and funny and thought provoking. And I would see it again and again\, in theaters as well as getting a copy for my home\, because overall it was a good Star Wars addition to me. I can't wait to see what happens next.
